text: I have been an employee at Promenade for 3 years! We work very hard to make sure everyone has a great experience!  I have also gotten my prom dresses from Promenade before I started to work here and I had a wonderful experience!  I would recommend Promenade to anyone!

name: Grace King
text: My daughter ordered 7 bridesmaids dresses from Promenade over 3 months before the wedding. Several girls lived out of state. They only had one dress of each style to choose from and no way to try on the correct size for each girl. They buy their their dresses from china and if you have ever ordered any clothing from there, you would know that they do not use american sizes.  Anyway, the dresses were supposed to be in at least 6 weeks before the wedding. The dresses never came in and we had less than 2 weeks before the wedding.  In a panic my daughter went to David's Bridal and she found a way more beautiful  dress that complemented all the girls. They put a rush on it and they came in in one week! They altered them in 2 days, all seven and was ready days before the wedding! I had to call 3 times, over 3 weeks to get my refund back from promenade. Save yourself the trouble and go to Huntsville Davids Bridal for a stress free  experience!

name: Thomas Segers
text: Was not happy with this place. They failed to call when tux was in and had to pull strings to get my tuxedo for a wedding. Service was in un friendly as well. For the money that I payed the least that could do is call and tell me when my stuff was ready. Caused me a real headache

name: Laura Parker
text:
We went a couple months before prom looking for a dress and we found my dress but all we needed was some small alterations done to it. So we went another day for the alterations to be pinned back and everything. About a month before prom we called up there to know if I dress had been altered. They said no they do it by the dates of prom no matter how early you bought the dress. So of course we ask when our dress will be done they said we would be lucky to get it the week before but definitely the week of. Then we get the dress and it was messed up lucky we knew someone that could fix the problem on short notice.

Personally if I was anyone else I would only buy whats in the store but take it somewhere else for alterations. And try to pay for it all at once so you don’t have to deal with them longer than you need to.

name: Ashley Bolt
text:
I hate to have to write this, but I feel the need to warn other brides about the service I received at Promenade. I would not recommend Promenade for any bridal services, especially bridesmaids dresses. I ordered dresses for my three bridesmaids about 5 months prior to my wedding. The manufacturer estimated a ship date about 6 weeks prior to my wedding. To make a long story short, the dresses never came in.

For more details, read below, but the bottom line is that I would take my business elsewhere in the future, and I recommend that others do the same. The consultants in the store were very nice and helpful, but it's not worth the headache of dealing with Promenade's lack of good communication skills. I guess they missed the lesson in business school that the customer is always right.

When the dresses did not arrive in time for my wedding, they did offer us dresses from another source that were in stock. However, the sizes that my bridesmaids needed were not available. All three of my bridesmaids lived out of town, so having Promenade alter a larger dress down a size was not a feasible option for me, even though the store suggested altering dresses THEN shipping to the bridesmaids. I felt that anyone who knows anything would realize this option was crazy on a timeline of 10 days before the wedding. What were we going to do if the dresses were altered, shipped, and arrived 5 days before the wedding, and still didn't fit?

So about 10 days before my wedding, I ordered replacement dresses from David's Bridal and paid for overnight shipping. I'll admit that the fact that the original dresses never came in may have been the dress manufacturer's fault, but Promenade did not handle the situation well. The owner did not return phone calls when my mother or I would leave messages at the store, and she did not check the status of the supposed shipment as early or as often as I would have liked.

I requested that the store reimburse me for the cost of the replacement dresses that the girls did not want or even like, but they refused. I sent an email to the owner with the invoices for these dresses, and never heard another word about it until I sent another email, waited 10 days, received no response, and then called the store to follow up.

I don't want to sound like another jaded bride, but the truth is that there are plenty of other local businesses that do a better job of communicating with their customers and valuing customer satisfaction.

name: Christina Renee
text: Cannot recommend Promenade for bridal services more!!! They are so professional and kind. It was a wonderful experience and they helped me pick just the right dress!

name: Lashawn Johnson
text: Nice place 2 shop 4 prom dreses

name: Joey Wilbanks
text: I ordered my tuxes for my wedding here, everyone was very helpful in helping me pick out what I was wanting. I would recommend promenade to everyone.

name: Gloria Etheredge
text: The people that worked there was very sweat and helpful found my daughter s beautiful prom dress thanks promenade

name: JP Rogers
text: Fiance stopped in to shop for a wedding dress.  After poor attitudes and service she left for other stores.  Luckily the other stores she visited treated her like her day was special.

name: Kristi May
text: I really didn't care for Promenade. I was hesitant about going here because a friend had bought her daughter's prom dress here for $700 and it literally fell apart every time she moved; the material and stitching were substandard and would rip and come unraveled. Her senior prom was ruined since she was afraid to move and she left early in tears. Her calls were never returned and completely ignored by the owner. My daughter wanted to look anyway. We didn't find a huge selection, and the one dress my daughter liked had sequins missing and coming off the back; the stitching was loose. Not to mention we didn't find much of anything under $500. The girl was very helpful and accomodating, very friendly, and helped us with suggestions. We bought elsewhere however.

name: Traci Guy
text: I am usually a pretty easy going girl who doesn't complain, but I would like to share an experience with Promenade in Tuscumbia, AL with everyone so you can be informed before attempting to use their services. One of my dearest friends is getting married 2 weeks from tomorrow. The other 2 bridesmaids and I ordered our dresses back in December and were assured they would arrive 12 weeks from the time of order. The last dress was ordered December 29th. I called toward the end of March to check on my dress since I needed to make arrangements to get from Tuscaloosa to Tuscumbia for pick up. I was assured at that time the dress would ship on April 13 and arrive at their store in 7 to 10 business days. I called back on April 26th to check on the status of the dress. I was told at that time the that the dresses would be in early this week. I called yesterday and was told the dresses were at the UPS hub in Muscle Shoals and were left off the truck for the delivery and the owner did not have time to go get the dresses. I was assured at that time that the dresses would be in Friday morning and I could pick mine up Saturday with no issue. Friday rolled around and to no ones surprise, the dresses did not arrive. We were again assured the dresses would arrive Monday (less than 2 weeks from the wedding). Call me a skeptic, but I have lost ALL TRUST in this business. We have now come up with a back up plan to have dresses here the week of the wedding from another company. The bride and other 2 bridesmaids have made numerous calls to this business and also been given the run around. Had we not taken matters into our own hands, I am not convinced we would have any dresses for the wedding. I wanted to put this information out there so others can avoid this unnecessary stress and hardship my friends and I have gone through. We are now working with them to get our money back and to no ones surprise we are being given the run around yet again.

text: I went to go find a prom dress and the lady who was in there was extremely nice. I told the her what I wanted and she immediately pulled out the perfect gown. All the dresses in there were gorgeous. Overall it was a calm and relaxing experience and I found my perfect dress.

name: Keri Vaughn
text: I went into this boutique today to hopefully find a wedding dress. Shopping for wedding dresses has been very difficult for me because I am not the perfect size. I have a large bust and most dresses that fit me in the bust don't fit in the waist. I have already tried on about 10 wedding dresses locally. This boutique doesn't carry a size larger than an 18. But I am aware that most boutiques will order a size bigger if it comes in the style that you want. There were 5 other girls shopping in there and trying dresses on and in front of all of them, Jenna, the general manager stated, in a very rude tone, that th dress I wanted doesn't come in a size larger than an 18, in front of all of these women. I will never come back to this boutique again. I hope they go out of business. Shopping for a wedding dress should be one of the funniest thing you do and this store manager was so rude. Steer clear from here! (I only gave it one star because I had to to post this review)

text: If I could give this place a 0 star review I would. Never was there a verbal or written contract on when the suits where suppose to be return. NEVER did they mention that the suits had a late fee. They had the audacity to argue with underage kids and try to threaten to “call the authorities” when they were on the wrong. horrible place. 0/10 never recommend.

text: The groomsmen paid half of what their rental was and following the pandemic the wedding was canceled. They were notified a month and a half before the wedding and promised to get refunds return but has yet to do so. Each time I call,  the owner was sick, then she was on bed rest, then she fell and broke her arm, and now they are just not answering. The voicemail is even full therefore you can't leave a message. It's really sad to say you are a professional business but not in the business of treating your customers right. Im going to consult with my lawyer. I wouldn't ever refer someone of such poor professionalism and poor communication skills. These people won't call back even after leaving many messages. It has been over 8 months that I have been calling them and yes they hour are conflicting.

name: Justin Chiriatti
text:
voicemail and website state that they are open until 5pm.  The business' answering machine tells people that call that they are open until 5pm.  I show up at 4:10 to give this local business my money, but they were closed.
A tiny sign in the window tells you they close at 4.  Closing at 5 is ridiculous enough being that most people work until 5pm.  Also, The 'emergency number" has a full voicemail consistently.  These people make it very difficult to give them your money.  I'm going to Madison or Huntsville from now on.

text: It’s Ridiculous that they do not stay open as stated on their business hours posted online and on their door. Guess they don’t care if they lose customers. This has happened twice. I’ll never make an attempt to shop here again.

name: Christina Alvarado
text: All of my bridesmaids' dresses and groomsmen's tuxes were ordered through Michael Mason Bridal. They worked with me through picking out which brand, color, and material my bridesmaids' dresses would be, and they also helped find vests and ties for the groomsmen that matched the bridesmaids' dresses. My circumstances were especially difficult because almost every single person in the wedding party was in a different state, and two were even in another country. I let my bridesmaids choose what style dress they wanted within the brand, color, and material I picked out, and Michael Mason was always very accommodating in taking orders and measurements for all the different styles of dresses. If I had it to do over, I would use Michael Mason again!

All I signed was a sales slip that requested my name and contact information. The dress never left their store and no alterations have been made. I will never do business here again and you really shouldn’t either.

We rented a tux last year for prom and the girl was very nice but did not set the return date with us.  She just said to return the tux Monday or Tuesday.   When we took it back on Tuesday, they charged us $20.  Ok.  Maybe I got it wrong, I thought.  So, this year we go on  a Friday and get fitted to rent a jacket and vest to the tune of $92!  We could have practically gotten the whole shebang for that.  Then we realize that my son told her the wrong date!  We call them on Monday to correct it only to be charged an extra  $20!  So $112 just to rent a jacket and vest.  So, now, he just went to pick it up for prom TOMORROW NIGHT and they have sent it back!!!  We paid the extra for them to "hold it" and they sent it back anyeay!
Ridiculous! Go here if you want extra charges for no reaso, if you want to pay a lot for a rental OR if you want poorly handled business.  BEYOND  VERY DISAPPOINTED!

name: Brenda Hancock
text:
I am a lifelong resident of the S Baldwin area.
Any time my family and I have needed jewelry repaired or serviced we have always trusted Manning’s. Just today I picked up a ring I had sized there. The workmanship and attention to detail is perfect. I could not be happier with the results.
Manning’s is a favorite of mine and I highly recommend this longtime Foley family owned business.
In sixty years we’ve never been disappointed with their professionalism, friendliness and the overall quality of their work.
If you are a newcomer to this area please visit them.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you! We have been thrilled by how many new-to-the-area people have been visiting based on reviews and personal referrals. We love our community!

text: I love wearing both yellow and white gold together. I’ve searched for a monogram necklace that used both. I found a plated piece I liked, but didn’t love-also wanted it to be in actual gold. Highly recommend Manning Jewelry!

The people in this store are

text: just talked to mary i was looking for a silver chain with a marlin or sailfish on it and they didnt have any but she took my number down and said she will find some send me pictures and order it if i like it that is awesome customer service right there cant wait

name: Thompson Stine
text: Literally perfect! This was probably the best customer experience I have ever had! I came in looking for an engagement ring that I needed that same night so I was fairly unprepared, very late and kind of frantic. Mary took the time to really explain the 4 C's so that I actually understood them, she also calmed me down and helped get me the perfect ring. She even gave me some great proposal and relationship advice that I have already followed. Duke was awesome too! He had the head/prongs changed on the band and the diamond set in less than an hour. I had to make up a story to tell my now FIANCÉE about where my brother in law and I were all day and told her we tried to go fishing but couldn't and we went and hung out at a bar named Duke's all day. They even offered to help me not blow my cover! I was kind of expecting to walk out empty handed due to the timing but I left with a ring better than I could have imagined and I was over the moon. I honestly don't think I could be any happier with Manning Jewelry, especially Mary and Duke! THANK YOU!!!

resp.text: The pleasure was all ours! Duke and I loved helping you find the perfect ring. Our goal is to educate you so you can make a well informed decision. We loved giving you a true Manning Experience. Please come by every time you return to the beach. Congratulations! `Mary and Duke

name: Sandra Roberts
text: Just want to give kudos to Becky, Mary and Duke at Manning Jewelry. Several months ago, I took in my sterling silver jewelry to be cleaned and repaired. They did a fabulous job. They cleaned my gold wedding rings and checked the prongs, on the spot, and didn't charge. My husband had lost some weight and wanted his wedding ring re-sized. Becky suggested he wait and see if he lost more weight before he got it re-sized. That was much appreciated as it told us they weren't out to just get our money.  Becky, Mary and Duke deserve a free lunch!! Everyone who works at Manning Jewelry are very polite, professional and friendly. I highly recommend Manning Jewelry to everyone.  Thank you for your fine service!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your excellent experience with Becky, Mary and Duke! We look forward to serving you again.

text: Me and my husband stopped in there to have a new battery  put in my dad's watch.The lady was very nice. It has been a very long time since me and my husband have been in Mr.Manning store. My husband bought  our wedding rings from Mr.Manning  coming up on 36 years in May. Some of my family members have also done business with  Mr.Manning.

name: Enrique Vazquez
text: I had my fiance's rings made there. She gets compliments on her engagement ring everywhere she goes. Impeccable craftsmanship from Mr. Manning, the staff is friendly, and prices are fair. Than you.

resp.text: The ring turned out so beautifully! We enjoyed working with you on your dream ring for your fiancé! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Barrett Lee
text:
This is an absolutely stunningly charming store located just off the square in downtown Foley. My first encounter with these fine folks was just  to get my favorite Fossil watch repaired a year or so ago. I have had a sorted history with this watch over the years with other jewelers in TN who have gouged me and taken upwards of six months to complete a job so now that I am a local here I wasn't sure what to expect from my local jeweler. Well these guys did a quick turnaround at a very reasonable price and not only replaced the stem but my  watch was so clean and polished that I did a double take because, at first, I thought they had given me a brand new watch by mistake. Nope, it is my watch and I could not have been happier.

Now as for the business, they have a wonderful selection of what you expect. Rings, watches, bracelets, earrings, etc. but they also have beautiful local artist pieces that are absolute stunning from inexpensive ocean themed pieces to a gorgeous diamond piece we just saw that range in prices into the thousands. They also buy gold and make custom pieces of your own design right in house.

We're here to yesterday to get my watch band repaired and they did it in minutes at no charge! That brings me to just how friendly, professional and all around terrific that everyone here, that I've encountered, are. I couldn't have asked to find a nicer group of folks in my new local jewelery store and I can assure that this a great place that I highly  recommend and that I will do all my jewelry business from now on!

Bottom line: they're great!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love to help our guests and it makes us happy to make you happy! Your taking the time to share your thoughts is so appreciated! See you soon!

name: Mark Dohner
text: I am so grateful to Daniel for his help and his talent. He designed our wedding bands and did an incredible job. I didn't make things easy on him and decided that I wanted some changes to my ring. Daniel made them quickly and executed the changes flawlessly. He is a consummate professional and he clearly cares deeply about making his customers happy. We are thrilled with our choice to go to Manning Jewelry for such an important purchase!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your taking the time. We do not have a Daniel here, however, and would like to know which of our associates gave you great service so we can commend him! Can you please call us at (251) 943-4771 so we can clear up the name and thank you in person?

name: Aimee Morgan
text:
Manning is our go to for fine jewelry needs. I have used them to create a few custom pieces. Mr. Glen remounted an Atocha coin in a beautiful custom setting and is willing to think outside the box to make something unique.
Every experience I have had is excellent. Penny is the real gem here. She has helped my family choose and create personalized jewelry. Getting to know her has been a pleasure and has helped my husband with exquisite gifts that are exactly what I would choose for myself.
I highly recommend heading to Manning's. We love to shop local, their selection is on point, and every one in the store is knowledgeable and friendly. I will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you Aimee! Penny is a gem and we are so happy you love the gifts chosen for you! We look forward to your next visit.

name: Local Business
text: Mr. Manning is THE best custom jeweler in Baldwin County. Honest. Dependable. Extraordinarily creative with custom design

resp.text: Wow thank you!

name: Shannon Holland
text: I feel compelled to promote this business.  I had such an amazing experience at Manning.  Everyone that works there was friendly,  professional,  and knowledgeable.  They worked below my budget and produced the most beautiful piece of jewelry I have ever seen.  Every time I look at my finger I say, wow thats beautiful!  Thank you and I will certainly back!

resp.text: It's an awesome feeling to have something beautiful to look at right on your hand, isn't it? We are so pleased you are thrilled with your experience and finished piece! Look forward to seeing you again soon

name: Nicole Schreiber
text: I highly recommend Manning Jewelry! Glenn Manning and staff have always been so kind, proficient, and just truly exceptional with their customer service. Recently I had my wedding set remodeled and it turned out perfectly. The sketch I had of what I wanted on paper is now on my hand. I can't stop staring at my ring! Thank you Glenn and staff for everything! Including being patient with my two small children!

resp.text: We are so happy you love your ring! Thank you for letting us know you had a great experience! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: LARRY GREEN
text: Wonderful, friendly staff.  Duke is an amazing designer. I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your recommendation! We strive to make our customers happy.

name: Anayeli
text: The best customer service!!! My fiancee and I went to "look" and Mrs Loretta was so helpful from the start. She was very patient and took the time to explain the types of diamond cuts etc. I can't wait for my ring to be done so I can finally wear my custom ring!!!! Thank you Mrs.Loretta !!!

resp.text: Loretta is so friendly and helpful, we are glad you got to experience her excellent service! Thank you for being such a pleasure to serve!

name: George Douty
text:
The ONLY place to buy jewelry, in my opinion.  Fabulous, quality pieces. Something to buy every time I go in there.  (Their layaway is great!).
Duke, Loretta, and Mary are very helpful, knowledgeable, and very nice.
I don't know all the names of the staff, but everyone has been great.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for the very kind words!

name: Happy G
text: Mary helped us with a custom ruby and diamond ring that EXCEEDS our expectations. The owner Glen worked with us efficiently to develop the Computer Aided Design quickly, then showed us a 3-D view, built a 3-D printed model for fit, and then cast the gold setting and set the stones.... all in house... in short time, for comparable price to that of an off the shelf setting! What a pleasant and memorable experience.

resp.text: The pleasure was all ours! We so enjoyed working with you both! Wishing you an incredible Anniversary! We loved being a part of such a wonderful occasion. Thank you Glen and Mary

name: Tim
text: I recently walked into this lovely jewelry store to get a ring sized. The first person that greeted me was Loretta, she was amazing! Very friendly and very knowledgeable. Loretta sized the ring up for my gal and made sure we're 100% happy. Loretta explain the process of what's going to be done and even introduced us to the Goldsmith. I highly recommend this store to anybody looking to buy jewelry or a jewelry repair.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. The ring turned out beautifully!

name: Kurt Hellmich
text:
If you need any custom work done please see Mrs Becky Green. She is out of this world and provides utterly superior customer service. She completely rebuilt a family heirloom ring for me. It was reshanked, repronged, the diamonds cleaned, and reset. The work was outstanding and had it ready before I left from vacation.

Give Mrs Becky a chance and you will not be disappointed!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Kurt for your kind and gracious words. It's always a pleasure to work with you and I know that you'll treasure that ring for years to come. You are the kind of customer that makes our job so enjoyable!

name: Lynne B
text: Worked with Penny Long. She was so helpful. I had a garnet ring which could not be repaired. She was able to get two new garnets for me to choose from. One was used to repair my ring. Then she suggested using the second stone for a custom necklace. It is simply beautiful. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Penny does a great job! We are so happy you love your new pieces!

name: Tracy M
text: We are so lucky to have found Manning Jewelry.  I was not finding anything I liked for an engagement ring in regular stores, and really worried that I was going to have to settle.  I found Manning Jewelry online, and read that they make custom design rings.  I found a ring online that I loved, and asked if they could make something like it, and was told Glenn Manning was confident he could.  Boy did he!!  My ring is AMAZING, and exactly what I wanted.  The whole process of designing the ring was so easy.  I kept saying "he gets it" throughout the whole process, because Mr. Manning completely understood my vision, and what I was looking for.  This ring is going to be such a special part of our lives forever, and I can't say enough how thankful we are that we were able to get it.  Thank you so much Manning Jewelry!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the confidence you had in Manning Jewelry to be a part of your special occasion. I enjoyed working with you and your fiance', and I am so glad we were able to make your vision a reality. We look forward to seeing you in the near future.

name: John Bednarczyk
text: Just had a bracelet made for my wife from an old necklace. The result is spectacular and fits perfectly.  Mr. Manning is an excellent goldsmith and meticulous in the details. The staff is a treat to work with, knowledgable and very pleasant.

resp.text: The bracelet turned out beautifully! So glad she loves it!

name: Joe Fannin
text: Manning’s is our favorite place to visit for jewelry. They set my wife’s first engagement ring for us and we recently upgraded that ring and had them reset the stone in a pendant. The people are super friendly and helpful. Duke redesigned my dad’s old ring to better suit my tastes and he did a fantastic job. Thanks to Loretta and the rest of the staff as well for all their helpful input. We highly recommend Manning for great service and quality.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experiences! We loved helping you and hope to see you again soon!

name: Edward Buker
text:
Manning Jewelry is just a wonderful and friendly family business. Helpful folks that are impeccably honest. It is a so much better customer experience to deal with owners and staff who care rather than a commercial chain jewelry store with off the street staff. We consulted with Glenn and  worked with April to have our jewelry appraised and cleaned. The work was professional and done on time. Just a pleasant experience start to finish. In
this hurried world, this business takes the time to do it right.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We appreciate your taking the time to share your thoughts, and look forward to seeing you again.

name: Dena Batterton
text:
While vacationing in Gulf Shores, Al in July 2020, I met a very nice lady by the name of Pepper. She lives in the condo complex where we were renting for the week. So I asked her if she could recommend a nice place to eat and if she knew of a good jeweler. She right away told us of some places to eat, then she called her jeweler friend Glenn Manning and got me an appt with him. She told me that Manning Jewelers’s has been in business for over 70 yrs. and how awesome everyone there is. And she was so right about that. And she showed me her beautiful ring that Glenn made for her.
Glenn took my old wedding and turned it into the most beautiful wedding ring I’ve ever seen. My husband and I were celebrating our 35th wedding anniversary in Gulf Shores. Because our trip to St Lucia was canceled due to Covid! And we had been planning to make some changes with my ring anyway, so this was the best time for us to do that. I believe God puts people in our life path for a reason. So meeting Pepper, then meeting Glenn was a huge blessing for us.
My husband was very impressed how Glenn designed my ring on his computer then made a resin ring to hold my stones so I could see how it would look and feel on my finger. I wanted to use my existing center stone as a side stone to represent our past 35 yrs of marriage, then added a new larger center stone for the present, and another side stone to match for the future. Then we decided to add a two sided ring guard using my existing ring guard diamonds. So not only did Glenn design a beautiful ring for me, he also saved us a lot of money. And he recommended a great company to insure my new ring with, which had a better price than our home owners insurance co.
I was very nervous about having my new ring shipped to me once it was done, just a few short weeks later, but Glenn put my mind at ease letting me know it will be insured and it came over night at my convenience. The whole process was Awesome! As well as the entire staff at Manning Jewelers. So if your heading to Gulf Shores, Al, or just looking for an Amazing  jeweler in that area, be sure to look up Manning Jewelers in Foley, Al. They are worth the drive from anywhere.
We also bought a really nice “flip flop” neck less for our daughter while we were in Manning’s  and she loves it. Plus Manning Jewelers’s also has a beautiful pendant called Stray Love that Glenn designed himself and he donates 20% of each sale to their foundation to help save stray animals. Best company to work with for all your jewelry needs.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Dena! We love designing custom pieces and seeing your dreams become reality. We are so happy Pepper sent you to us, and can't wait to see you again!

name: Donna Boswell
text: Have been going here for years for repairs and purchases. They never disappoint and are honest with estimates and all charges. Great people and great store!  Donna Boswell

resp.text: Thank you, Donna! We appreciate you sharing your thoughts and love our great customers!

text: Visiting Gulf Shores for my vacation and my eye glasses broke. Manning Jewelry was the only place that could weld my glasses back together. Amazing customer service! Would highly recommend!

Our Family Jeweler for 35 years, Manning has sold, cleaned, repaired and restored heirloom pieces and made sure my personal design for my wedding ring was perfect.

The jewelry is current AND deliciously vintage side by side.
Their displays inspire calm in myself and the girls, while also making my husband cringe.
It is handicapped accessible, impeccably clean (you'd think removing the drool and fingerprints would be a full time job alone!).

text: The owners know what they are doing! They have great taste and  will go out of their way to not only give you the look you desire, but they are also accommodating to your schedule. We have NEVER had a bad experience here and we’ve used them for everything....  prom, pageants, work, gifts! They really do dress the best!! I definitely recommend shopping at Elan!

name: Julie Stewart
text: If I could give one star, I definitely would. My daughter has never been "prom dress shopping", so this was a special event for her. We drove 2+ hours to Elan, and we were greeted as we entered the store. Everything else from that point was terrible. My daughter tried on several gowns and the salesgirl held the train on each dress as I took a photo of my daughter in it - never one time did she ever ask us not to take photos of the gowns. After my daughter had tried on about 4-5 dresses, one of the other salesgirls commented "we don't really like for y'all to take photos of the tags", to which I said I was sorry and we stopped taking photos of the tags on the gowns. I was unsure why, but I assume it is because their gowns are marked up well over retail. After my daughter tried on 1-2 more gowns, an older lady walked over to us and very rudely yelled at my daughter if she was taking pictures she would have to delete all of them before leaving the store. She also said "I know two of my girls have already told you to stop taking pictures". This is untrue, as the only person who had previously said anything was the salesgirl (not ours) that said not to take photos of the tags. I could see my daughter was very visibly upset, so we said thank you and left the store. They lost my business forever, as well as everyone I know that I can tell about our experience. My daughter commented when we left that she never wants to go prom dress shopping ever again, so I am really upset that these incredibly rude girls have ruined this experience for my daughter.

resp.text: This customer was not treated anything but wonderful in our store. She was greeted upon arrival and employees spent hours catering to her every need.  If mistreated the entire time no one would spend 2 hours in a store. Upon entry into our store on the front door and posted at every dressing room are NO photography signs. That is our store policy due to customers like this one.  Once a gown is purchased you are more than welcome to take all the photos you would like. This specific customers after being asked twice not to take photos continued to take pictures of Gown tags and photos of gowns. If you plan to purchase a gown in our store there would be no need to take photos of our tags. All of our gowns are priced the same as any other retailer so you will not find it cheaper unless it is a used product. After being asked repeatedly to not take photos and the customer blatantly in front of employees & other customers continuing to not follow store policy she was asked very politely by the store manager to please delete any photos taken in our store as it is against store policy. No one ever raised their voice at this customer nor were they mistreated in any way.  They were kindly asked to follow the store policy like every other customer. This customer then left our store after taking up hours of employees’ time, trying on our product, finding her correct size and went on resale sites posting exactly what size she needed and photos of herself in our merchandise in our store trying to find it at a used price. We are a small business trying to succeed after a struggle with Covid and customers like this one are the reason we have store policies in place to try to combat people taking advantage of hard working individuals and businesses.

name: Ryan Kelley
text: I had reserved a 26 foot truck from the Rental Place about a week earlier than I needed it. I showed up early to my reservation time and had already entered all my information into their computer system online. The lady behind the counter was appreciative of me doing so. I went outside to get the truck, but the brakes barely worked, and there was no power steering. Power steering fluid was actually all over the floor board. So I went back inside to get another truck from them, but that was the only 26 foot truck they had. I would have thought that employees ensured they had good, working vehicles to rent out to fulfill their reservations for the following day. Because of this, I had to drive out of my way to get another truck and pay even more money because these trucks are also charged by the mileage you use($0.99/mile), wasting about an hour of my time that I needed to be moving, not finding a truck to use. The lady behind the desk even said to another employee, “I don’t even remember the last time that truck was used”.  I would think that if the employees would routinely check their vehicles to make sure they are in working order, especially if that vehicle has been reserved by a customer for the following day.

name: Julie Allen
text: The "woman" behind the counter needs to learn some customer service skills. I reserved a 10' truck that was GUARANTEED @ 10am. Show up and 10 and am told, it's not here. They're running behind. Okay, so I have to wait on a truck that was GUARANTEED @ 10am??? How is that okay??? The woman behind the counter wanted to argue with me about it and say we can't do anything. Well, it's not my fault you are so disorganized and terrible at your job!

text: This was a 50th Wedding Anniversary with a bridal party from 5 different states with 5 different sizes, shoes and accessories. This is the place to handle anything. Any issue was rectified immediately by the Tuscaloosa management, especially Shanty. An example, the shoe size was not right, they had it shipped to the women's front door. But more importantly, their calm attitude and work ethic  was of great value. Kept the bride and girls at peace as details were worked out quickly. Everything worked out lovely and everyone looked great! Thank you Shanty and staff. We had a wonderful time working with you.

name: Amber Barger
text: I went to David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa on Saturday. I didn't have an appointment. The girls got me right back. Shelby was my stylist & she was awesome. I told her exactly what I wanted; which was a dress with sleeves.  I showed her pictures from online & she found all the dresses. I'm a plus size bride so I was scared; I wouldn't have a lot of selections. I was very wrong; they had dresses in stock for any size bride. Shelby found me three great dresses. There was a dress online that had short sleeves. Shelby let me try on the same dress in strapless & told me she could order it for me with sleeves. Shelby explained payment arrangements & credit options to pay for the dress. Shelby broke everything down in detail for me. Which was very helpful for a new bride with a budget. I was very close to ordering that dress. But, I really wanted to try it on with the sleeves. I was so impressed with David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa; I made an appointment the same day at the David's Bridal in Hoover. I was thinking Hoover would have more dresses with sleeves & possibly have that dress with sleeves to try on. That was the worst idea ever. The store in Hoover is a huge disappointment for David's Bridal. The customer service needs to be reviewed at the Hoover store. The employees at that store are very unprofessional. After the bad experience at the Hoover store; I started reading reviews & asking friends. Apparently that is common for the David's Bridal in Hoover. If I decide to order through David's Bridal, it will definitely be with the Tuscaloosa David's Bridal. Great job David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa.

text: Corrie came through again!! On relatively short notice, she hit a home run for me with the delivery of 3 beautiful arrangements for a wedding shower I hosted. Her creativity in design showed through. Everyone commented on how beautiful the flowers were! Thanks, Corrie.

name: Kayla Schmaeling
text: In an absolute time crunch, and a last minute planned wedding, Corrie and 333 Designs swooped in and completely saved the day. While planning a quick, immediate family wedding in Charleston, Sc, Corrie was more than willing and happy to help anyway she could! She was able to create the most stunning bridal bouquet and boutonnière on a last minute request. She took my ideas and vision and made it even more beautiful than I had hoped! She packed everything up and hand delivered the arrangements the day we were set to leave - please note, she did this in about ZERO time and absolutely blew us away! The flower are now about a week and a half old and the bridal bouquet, set in water, is still holding strong! I can’t say enough about Corrie and 333 Designs - I highly recommend them!

name: Amy Mayfield
text: Corrie and her whole team worked to make our event look the best it's ever looked. We got rave reviews from our attendees and she went out of her way to ensure everything looked amazing!

text: Excellent customer service. We used 333 for our wedding, and my fiance and I were so busy in the weeks before the wedding we never really had time to meet with Corrie. But she was very accommodating and made time for us to call and email to get every detail arranged. Very good service. I can't wait to see her creations!

resp.text:
Dear Genevieve,
I loved designing your flowers and helping you with your wedding. It's my job to work around your busy schedule and help bring together all the details. You both were a pleasure to work with, and I loved seeing your photos!

Wishing you both the best!
Corrie and the 333 Team

name: Jareen Alam
text: From day one, Corrie Spearing of 333 Designs has helped both my husband and I to plan our wedding reception in Huntsville, Alabama. She is THE master planner and we are so thankful to have her by our side the entire time. Corrie was very easy to work with; she knew exactly what we had envisioned within our first meeting. This made things much simpler and smooth on our planning end. The moment we walked into our reception hall, both of us were in complete shock of how beautiful things were. My husband and I did absolutely nothing at our wedding reception, other than to enjoy the moment and actually get the chance to mingle with our friends and family. We even got to enjoy our dinner with family, and have cake! We are so grateful for that and will forever cherish these moments! Corrie did a fantastic job, and took this event under her arms as a true professional that she is in this line of career. She was easy to work with, talented, quick to reply, queen of multitasking, and just super awesome! Thank so much for everything! If ever again in the future we need a planner, we are coming right back to you!

resp.text:
Jareen,

What a joy to be a part of your special day! Thank you for taking the time to reply and leave us a review. We know your time is valuable and it means the world to us that you were pleased and let us know!

Sincerly,
Corrie and the 333 Designs team

name: Katie Chandler
text: We recently used 333 Designs for our wedding and were extremely disappointed with our experience. In meetings they seemed to understand exactly what was wanted, given exact pictures for some decorations and told things that the bride did not want to see anywhere. The day of my wedding I walked in to one of my locations and everything was the opposite of what I asked for. We did not receive what we feel we paid for at all and believe there was some time mismanagement which led to many things not being done properly. After the wedding we were billed an additional charge even though we had paid in full what the contract had said before our wedding. We will never choose to work with or recommend 333 designs again.

resp.text:
Dear Katie,
We are saddened by your review and to hear that after all that we did we were unable to make you happy.
We do our best to manage expectations, by design boards, detailed notes, as well as written out details in the final invoices. We understood your dreams and to be fair the final weeks leading to your big day your parents, and yourself, agreed to keep things in a more reasonable budget and made some changes. We had those changes clearly noted and approved before even ordering the flowers. Everyone saw the “Pinterest” style wedding and commented on how kind we were and how we went above and beyond what we were even contracted to do. The compliments from your family and friends and the many apologies for how we were treated by you were a testimony that we handled the wedding professionally and everything was beautiful. We hope that you can look back one day and see all the love and sacrifice everyone did to help make your wedding day come together and look so breathtaking.

Wishing you all the best and a wonderful marriage,
Corrie and the 333 Team
To see images from the wedding please click here: https://333designs.com/portfolio/katie-and-reed/

name: Madeline Creekmore
text: Corrie was fantastic to work with!  I would highly recommend her to ANYONE looking for a wedding or event coordinator.  She did day-of planning for me for my wedding a few weeks ago, and I couldn't have been happier with our decision to higher her.  When I first started planning my wedding, I did not think it was worth the money to higher a coordinator.  But as plans started to get more and more complex, I quickly realized that I was in over my head.  There were so many details to attend to on the day of the wedding, and I knew that I would not be in the right frame of mind to handle them myself.  Corrie listened to all of my ideas and executed them better than I could have myself.  Everything about my wedding day ran flawlessly because of her efforts, and my family and I were much more at ease and able to relax and enjoy the day knowing that Corrie had it under control.  My only regret from my wedding planning process was that I didn't hire her sooner to help me plan the whole thing! If you are looking for a fun and professional wedding coordinator, look no further, Corrie is your gal!   Oh... and did I tell you she did my hair???  She Did My Hair!  And it was GORGEOUS!

resp.text:
Madeline,
Looking back and reading reviews like this makes me so happy! I loved helping and taking stress off of everyones plate. Thank you for leaving such a wonderful review. We strive to help and provide a service like no one else! Glad I could help you with your hair too! It means so much to know that I was able to help you out during your special day!

Blessings,
Corrie and the 333 Team

text: When my fiancée, now my wife, said she wanted to have a day-of wedding coordinator, I thought it would be a waste of money.  I COULD NOT HAVE BEEN MORE WRONG! Having Corrie and the rest of the 333 Design team working with us made the days leading up to our wedding much easier.  I can’t even imagine how stressful the actual wedding day would have been without Corrie.  She gave me a Groom’s timeline, and all I had to do was to be at the indicated location at the correct time.  333 coordinated with all of our vendors, set up and broke down our entire reception, and handled any issues that came up before and during our event.  I cannot stress how much you need Corrie and her team - worth every penny!!

resp.text: Thanks for supporting what we do, Rocco. We love that we could help make your wedding be as easy as possible -- it's all about enjoying the day with your beautiful bride! We appreciate the kind words and hope the married life is treating you well. -Kind regards, The Team at 333 Designs

text: 333 Design is an event planner I often work with. Her talent and professionalism is outstanding! I can easily say the brides I have done makeup for have been more at ease on their wedding day because of her!

Corrie

name: TaCara Harris
text: Poor communication, extremely unprofessional, and unacceptable customer service. A detailed review of my cousin's wedding contract reveals that multiple provisions were breached by 333 Designs without explanation or remorse, and she was left having to find replacement planners right before her wedding. If 0 stars were an option, it would be warranted in this case. Beware!

resp.text:
Dear TaCara,

We are so sorry your cousin was unhappy. We also value your family loyalty. We would be happy to meet with you cousin to discuss the contract further if she feels something was not completed as agreed.  We always strive to accommodate and we love to make people happy when we can!

Sincerely
333 Designs

name: CORANDA AND CHARLES WIMS
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text: We want to assure you our team is happy to work with brides and grooms with any budget, Coranda, and we apologize if we gave off any other impression -- that was not our intent. It sounds like there was some definite miscommunication, and if you reach out to us privately, we'd love to answer any questions. Wishing you all the best. Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Cassie Shropshire
text: If the bride wants a stress free coordinator, I would not recommend using 333 designs. Corrie made the entire planning process stressful for both the bride and groom then insinuated on several occasions they were broke. It was absolutely disgusting and she was fired 2 weeks before the wedding because of her unprofessionalism.

resp.text:
This and the several reviews before and to follow are very sad. We have such a desire to serve and provide a service, however, we simply cannot provide services that our outside of our physical ability or contract.

This is one of the reasons we have contracts. -We provided everything in and according to contract, but the client had expectations and requirements that were far outside of our agreement, and they refused to pay more for the services they requested. Two weeks before when they still were requiring us to do more than we could, we felt it was best to walk away. We agreed to credit the couple back some of the money (even though we were not required to do so) and they could use the money how they felt they should. We also agreed that there would be no slander or malice on either side because we came to an agreement, and each party walked away content with these terms. If you would like more information in regards to this please let us know. If you are reading this know that we cannot  provide free services or labor,  and this couple was asking of us.

name: Sarah Melendez
text: Their team is amazing! They make everything so easy! We love you guys!

resp.text:
Sarah,

That's what we love to hear! We love helping making dreams come true and hope to make life so much easier!

Glad you are so pleased!!
Corrie (planner with 333 Designs)

The rehearsal was expertly directed by Corrie’s assistant Lauren giving me confidence in the ceremony.  Corrie and Lauren worked together during the ceremony and reception to ensure smooth transistions.  I was able to enjoy one of the happiest days of our lives without worry.  I highly recommend Corrie and 333 Designs.

We're thrilled to have been a part of one of the happiest days of your life!

Thanks for taking the time to share this with us. It was a pleasure working with you, and your daughter! Blessings on you all and their marriage!

-Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

resp.text: You rock! Thanks for sharing this -- your support is appreciated. It's always a please working with you guys, and we hope to create more beautiful events in the future! Kind regards, The team at 333 Designs

name: Brighton Pollard
text: Corrie is not only a wonderful florist but an amazing person. She's such a kind, ambitious, and driven person and truly a pleasure to work with! I would have loved for her to be my planner but she was already booked as a planner for the day so BOOK THIS VENDOR IN ADVANCE!! For my wedding, I didn't really want a lot of flowers but just a TON of greenery and Corrie nailed it with just a few springs of lavender and thistle (which was such a unique feature) and then a few peonies and ranunculus for my bouquets and cake. The arbor was so beautiful it became kind of like a photo booth backdrop where all my guests took pictures through out the night. She set up draping and lights when I decided last minute and responded to my way too many emails in a prompt manner. I'm kind of a control freak =/ She even made last minute changes to the bridesmaids floral crowns to ensure I was happy the day of. I've highly recommended Corrie and 333 Designs to several of my friends and would to anyone who asked.

resp.text:
Brighton,

I have loved getting to know you and so glad we could continue after the wedding as friends. I love your photos and I am so glad you choose to work with us! Thank you for such a great review!

Sincerely,
Corrie and the 333 team

name: Nathanael Zurinsky
text: Corrie Spearing is the absolute worst wedding planner and florist.  She has no organizational skills and does not pay attention to details. I have documented evidence from receipts, to Corrie's own contract, to the wedding pictures, and wistness testimony stating all the things that she messed up at our wedding.  I have a total of over 31 documented items that she messed up on.  It was pointless to have Corrie for our wedding planner when we could have done all the work ourselves and saved almost $3K that we spent to not have to worry about all the things that she messed up.  For further information, please see a detailed list of items that were filed with the BBB that list out all the things that she messed up.  I would not recommend her to anyone!

resp.text:
Nathanael,

You're wedding day was beautiful and I am sad that you felt it was ruined. The photos turned out amazing and everyone said it was wonderful. We know that we went above and beyond, and we helped provide services that were not event listed in our contracts. We always strive to please and meet expectations, we are deeply saddened by your response. Blessings on your and your wife Mary. Sincerely,
333 Designs

text: My mother always said if you don't have anything good to say, then don't say anything at all.

You were hired to do a specific job, and as we appreciate your willingness to help, you did not provide the services that the client requested nor what we had discussed days before the event. If you were unable to provide the items you agreed to provide and would have let us know things could have gone more smoothly and my team and the catering staff would not have had to help you out so much. text: Real bad customer service went in to rent some items a young lady went to back and got a gentleman he came back out and said they couldn’t rent to me cause I was about to fight an employee. name: S Johnson
text: I rented a drum sander for one week yesterday from the Mobile,  Alabama location and purchased $100.00 in sanding sheets. (this brought the $ total to $350.00 )  once I was home and my subcontractor arrived to begin work... It was discovered that I was given a sander and sanding sheets for different models. It was after closing so I had no option but to send my worker home and deal with blue rents in the morning.  We arrived at the store before eight and was greeted by a very helpful man who addressed our problem straight away.  He was able to credit the original contract and generate a new one for the actual unit we have at home. At this point, it was discovered that they did not have sanding sheets in the quantity we had purchased originally. I asked for a manager to review our situation. "Chuck" arrived within minutes and offered this creative,  beyond expected resolution: keep the model we have until we return the replacement unit.  The sanding sheets we purchased yesterday will work with Unit2. To Summarize: we all make mistakes..the way we resolve those mistakes tells the world how much "customer service " matters to us individually and the company we represent.   Blue Rents of Mobile scored off the charts... Thanks to everyone who assisted in this encounter...... S Johnson

text: I rented a golf cart and while trying to load it on a trailer it wouldn’t start so we all assumed that it was the battery the dead and instead of the manager buying a new battery he suggested that we waited for it to charge for a little while and suggested that we have jumper cables just in case the golf cart battery dies again we refused and asked the manager again would he purchase a battery since the battery source is right next door and he still refused I got my money back because of the hassle and non customer care that I received the manager acted as if he didn’t want me to rent the golf cart from the beginning with his racist attitude that he presented us with he was very unfriendly and nonchalant about the situation from the start he was very unpleasant when the lady inside forgot to charge me for the damage deposit he came out and asked if I was the one that rented the golf cart I said yes and he unpleasantly stated that I needed to go back inside and pay it as if it was my fault that I didn’t pay and I will not ever rent anything else from a place that exhibits prejudice because my money is green too I give two thumbs down 👎🏽 For blue rents .

name: Jessica Whigham
text: I didn't like the fact that the representative placed me on hold and then the line disconnected (hung up in my face). AWFUL customer service. She could have simply said we're closing please call back Monday or she could have taken my number and called me back Monday. I'm planning an event. I will definitely spend my money somewhere else with good customer service. They ruined a business opportunity before it even began.

name: Kerry Lambert
text: We had a Easter Egg Hunt at our facility.  And rented a big slide from Blue Rents. The kids loved it and so did the parents!

name: Mandi Donald
text: DO NOT USE!!!!!!!!!!!! I hired Blue Rents to provide tables, chairs and tents for my company (a major corporation) for a community event sponsoring a local high school. There were over 300 public officials including law enforcement, firemen, EMTs from the area. Also, the school board and all faculty from the school system. My initial experience with a salesperson, Margaret, was pleasant. I explained my needs and she booked every item as needed. The day before the event- I received a confirmation call for delivery the following day between 12 and 2. This reassured me that everything would go as scheduled. This was not the case. I called 6 times trying to get the salesperson to give me an ETA. This proved to be around 4pm. The event started at 5pm. They sent one guy with part of my order. Because there was only 1 guy- my children unloaded and set up the tables with the table cloths- 18 to be exact! This guy only had the railing for the 2 tents. About 30 minutes later- another guy showed up with a helper. They had to find a faucet to load the water barrels to hold the tents down....After all of this... they had NONE of my CHAIRS! After a call to the salesperson- she had the audacity to say- "You didn't order chairs"!!!!!!!!! Thank goodness one of the catering people knew the Vice Principal of this school. Between my children, the lady and my husband- we took our own vehicle to pick up over 100 chairs and set them up ourselves. I cannot stress enough that you do not need to put any faith in this company. They do not stand behind anything they promise. I do not know how they stay in business. I cannot disclose our company name (a major petro-chem company). Just know that you've been warned.

name: Rolounda Hayes
text: Rented a fryer from Blue Rent for a family reunion this past weekend. We were ultimately never able to use the equipment. We purchased about 100 lbs of fish and shrimp for this event and it all went to waste. I asked for a partial refund which was $65. The person who I spoke with told me I would be refunded. Afterwards they stated nothing was wrong with the equipment, and they wouldn't be issuing a refund. I stated we couldn't get it to work properly. We took a much bigger lose then they did. This company is very inconsiderate and I don't recommend anyone to use them.

text:
I have not used this company personally for rentals. However, I work at a venue that is used for weddings. On every occasion, their male staff that helps with set up makes our female staff uncomfortable with remarks they make to each of us.

Management, please get this behavior under control. We don't show up to your place of employment and hit on your staff; your staff absolutely should not do it to ours.

text: I had a really poor experience with customer service here. We rented a restroom trailer for our wedding. Despite multiple contacts with sales, we were not informed that we needed a water hookup until the day of delivery. When I called to confirm that there was not a onboard water tank, they refused to let me talk with the manager and talked over me until I admittedly lost my cool and was hung up on with no return call from the manager. On the day of the wedding, a neighbor who was kind enough to make sure everything was running smoothly found that the generator had stopped working and was hung up on by the receptionist after trying to contact the person who told him they would fix the problem. We ended up fixing it ourselves. The rudeness of the staff was appalling, especially considering the amount we paid to their company. We will never use this company again and will recommend others to avoid this company at all costs.

text: I was blown away by the customer service at Hudson-Poole. We came in to look at engagement rings on a Saturday about 30 minutes from closing, and the staff were incredible. text:
The reviews here don’t lie.. excellent customer services! My name is Holly . I have visited the store to redesign a band for my diamond ring that I’ve had for a long time but not liking the style too much.
They drawer up a beautiful fancy computer graphics design of the ring base on details I want with measurements of all angle... and even provided me a wax version of the band to try on.. and everything is free of charge.. isn’t that Amazing 💕
But I later have decided of not to go with it because my sister like the original ring and wanted to purchase the ring from me..
I felt bad to have them working so hard for me for nothing so I also purchased a beautiful pair of diamonds and citrine earring before I left the store just to thank you for their service ❤️
Love them ❤️The best in town

resp.text: Holly, you are so sweet to take the time to write this incredible review!!! We love making custom pieces with family stones. That is what makes jewelry so special, the ones that can tell the story of the family and their journey. I am so glad that your sister will be enjoying that ring. Please let us know if we can help in the future. We wish you many blessings!!

text: Incredibly helpful staff! They appraised and cleaned my antique and new jewelry and were very intrigued by a few pieces discussing with me all the details they could tell me. Definitely will be returning for future cleanings and hopefully purchases as well!

resp.text: Ashley, we thank you so much for taking the time to give us this great review and for the five stars! Come by anytime and have a great day.

name: James Waltman
text: Wonderful collection of jewelry and other great gift ideas. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive. Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers is the ONLY place i shop for my fine jewelry needs.

name: Junea Childers
text: Traveled 108 miles getting there. Called before I went. Told them I was bringing a 1954 Gibson Mandolin. However when I got there. I was being checked in by a nice counter clerk, when all of the sudden a young man came out and abruptly rushed me out saying "there was no market for instruments". When in their TV ad they had promoted a variety of items they were accepting. Instruments included.

resp.text:
Junea,
I am so sorry that you took your time to come to our store and not get a good answer. This is the first time we have partnered with a buying group that does the variety that they do. I wish the young man had asked me or my father who in town deals in fine instruments. I have a wonderful referral for you, as we have already called one of the owners that would very much like to make an offer on your mandolin. Please contact Dan at the Guitar Gallery. Here is their website:
https://theguitargallery.com

We really hope that this works out, and we will  always be here to help in any of your jewelry needs if you can give us another chance.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice-President

name: Luke Remmert
text: Simply the best jeweler in town. No need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: We really appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review, Luke!

name: Andrew Durham
text: I’m not sure where to start to explain how happy and satisifed I am with Hudson Poole. I walked in and met Heather, and from the second I met her I felt so comfortable and like I knew her. Mrs. Jamie Poole shortly also assisted me. Mrs. Poole was absolutely wonderful. She respected my opinions, she walked me through a step in life that I am new to. Hudson Poole has my business for life. Generally, going into a fine jewelry store is a very overwhelming experience as generally the staff doesn’t open up and welcome. These folks made me feel like family. Thank you Hudson Poole for being so amazing!

resp.text: Jake, thank you so much for this incredible review!! We are extremely proud and humbled that you have chosen us to be your family jeweler, and we work very hard to keep your trust.

name: Happy Lady
text: First I would like to say thank John for doing a fantastic job with my ring. John went above and beyond to work with me. Everyone at Hudson Poole always makes me feel welcome. I will use Hudson Poole forever. The way I can custom do jewelry makes me so excited!

resp.text: WOW! This is an amazing review! Thank you so much!!

name: caroline staggers
text: Always very friendly, professional and helpful. Beautiful selection of jewelry and gifts. Do great repair work.

resp.text: Caroline, Thank you very much for this great review. We really appreciate you coming by to see us!

name: Peony
text: I spent a long time searching for a strong but delicate-looking die-struck (not cast) setting for the stones from my old broken down three-stone ring. Krista and staff helped me find the perfect setting. I drove hours to Tuscaloosa and back several times (past plenty of other jewelry stores) to get the prettiest ring and best customer service. Everyone at Hudson-Poole is responsive and so helpful--in person, by phone, text and email. The long trip was absolutely worth it!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for giving us this wonderful review! We appreciate you trusting us to reset your three stone ring. Please come by anytime for us to clean and check it.

name: Jeremey Newell
text: I had a very special wedding band sized down. I took it home and noticed it didn’t fit as well as I thought. This was a mistake that I personally made. It had nothing to do with the quality of work that Hudson-Poole provides. I went back to Hudson-Poole and asked them to resize again. Not only did they resize, but they did it at no additional costs. They said my satisfaction was their goal. Excellent customer care. They will definitely handle all of my fine jewelry business in the future.

name: Emily DeFrance
text: Their jewelry is exquisite and there are so many beautiful choices. The customer service is excellent and you feel like family when you are there.

resp.text: Emily, thank you for coming to see us and for the excellent review. We will work hard to make sure it stays this way and for anyone you send to us. I am so sorry for the late "thank you". Have a wonderful 4th of July!

name: Vivian Tant
text: Gene and his staff are phenomenal. You immediately feel at home when you walk through the door. Gene and John both did a fantastic job of helping me pick out my wedding band and my future husbands wedding band. They talked me through the whole process, and I left feeling like I knew exactly what I was getting and how important I was to their company. I will forever send anyone looking for jewelry to them! Thankful for such a wonderful company in our community!

resp.text: Vivian, thank you so much for this phenomenal review! We appreciate you letting us be the ones to help you with your wedding bands and we will continue to work hard to keep that trust to be your family jeweler.

name: George Jacob Houghtaling
text: The BEST jewelry store in Alabama!  The BEST customer service in Alabama!  The BEST prices in Alabama!  You get the idea?  I have been doing business here over 12 years and never have been disappointed.  Gene, Jamie, John, Krista and their outstanding staff are true professionals.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review, George!!

name: Leanne Phillips Mays
text: I just purchased my garnet and diamond "Roll Tide" ring from out of state. I originally saw this ring on Pinterest several years ago, and have spent many nights stressing that they would discontinue it before I could buy it. Ashley took care of me with the most professional and caring manner. My ring arrived today, and it is worth every penny. Thank you for helping my dream piece of jewelry become a reality.

name: Susie Palmer
text:
Always very friendly staff.  Always.
I brought a box-chain necklace back, which I had bought from there.  It broke as I was cleaning it.
They repaired it on my visit and I walked out with it.
Not too mention, they also helped me a with watch band adjustment (not bought from them). Noncharge.  Simply a complimentary service.
That's why I will wait, until a trip back to Alabama from Oklahoma, just to go by Hidson-Poole.  They always treat me well.
Thank you!  :)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susie. I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to give us this great review. We hope to see you the next time you are back in Tuscaloosa.

name: Kathleen Stein
text: They did a great job fixing my bracelet. Their price for the repair was very affordable and the customer service was great!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you very much, Kathleen!

name: Christien Hawthorne
text: I am absolutely in LOVE with my ring! I ordered it online and the next day received a call from John Poole who is the Vice President of the company. He told me that unfortunately the ring was out of stock but that he had already contacted the designer in New York to have them build a new one which would only take about two weeks. Sure enough, I later received another call from Mr. Poole notifying me that my ring was ready and that he would set up email alerts for the shipping so I could track the package. It arrived in a cute little wrapped box with a big bow and had a business card that was personally signed. Loved the personal touch. Awesome experience -- will definitely recommend to others!

name: HRH METALS
text: Very nice people/helpful/nice large place/probably have what you need or want

name: Barbara Nicosia
text: I left 2 pairs of earrings to be fixed.  When they called & gave me the price, I said just fix one, the other one’s too expensive for its worth.  When I picked them up, Mr. Poole told me they had fixed both of them, & he wasn’t going to charge me for the 2nd pair since it was their mistake.  So nice to find honest, reputable merchants still around!

resp.text: We really appreciate the five star rating and for this wonderful review, Barbara! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.

name: Sammy Gray
text: Exceptional service! Very courteous, and everyone went out of their way to help with all our needs. As a first time customer, I've definately found my new primary jeweler for future purchases!

name: Brittany Graham
text:
Hudson-Poole is a fantastic Place to purchase jewelry. Not only do they have an outstanding selection of merchandise that is all very different and can suit anyone’s taste, their customer service is out of this world. I will continue to shop from them, even though I am not a local, because of those two things.

They care about their customers, they have a fantastic selection, and you can tell that they care about you as a person and not just getting business from you. That, to me,  is everything. You can’t go wrong with this place! :-)

name: Kristy H
text: Big thanks to John for taking such great care of all my needs and wants. I highly recommend this company if you are looking for your next piece of jewelry! Thanks again for being so kind and taking care of me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for giving us another chance and for this wonderful review!

name: Hannah George
text: A great jewelry shop with unique merchandise good for anyone's taste! Also, incredible customer service. The workers will spend time with you to suit your needs. When my ring I had bought a month ago began to lose color, Hudson-Poole replaced it without any charge. I cannot speak highly enough on how wonderful this place is!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review, Hannah! We thank you for coming back to see us to let us get it right.

name: Julia Clark
text: Hudson Poole is full of some of the kindest staff members. I truly feel the people here look out for their customers best interests. A big thank you to John Poole for helping me get the necklace of my dreams in the metal color that I preferred. It's even better than I had envisioned and I cannot thank you enough.

resp.text: We are blown away by your wonderful review, Julia. Thank you so much for your time and thought that you put into it!

name: Camille Robinson
text:
Very few jewelers have all the qualities I need in meeting my expectations for superior quality merchandise, customer service and custom pieces.  Hudson-Poole Fine Jewelers makes my “A List”.
I have purchased and had custom pieces made by Hudson-Poole for many years.  In fact, I am working with John Poole now on a new custom ring.  If you are looking for a professional jeweler, visit Hudson-Poole in Tuscaloosa,Alabama.

Camille Ogden Robinson

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great review, Camille!

name: joseph ushe
text: First class, actual people who want to Help you and make sure you are happy! I will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review, Joseph!

name: Natalia Go
text: If I could give a 10 star out of 5, I would! Hudson-Poole saved my wedding day! This is probably the best jewelry store I every walked into. My fiancee and I don't have a big budget for our wedding and we needed something that we could afford. Ashley was there with us every step of the way, making sure that we get the rings we want and that we stay on budget. She is a hero! Plus, they offer services for maintenance and repairs, some for free. I definitely love Hudson-Poole <3 This will be the first place I would go to for any piece of jewelry.

resp.text:
Natalia,
I read your review and was blown away! Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such a great testimonial. I spoke with Ashley and Tanner and we all truly appreciate you both thinking of us for your wedding rings.  We will do all we can to continue to be your family jeweler. The next time you are by the store I would really like to thank you in person, so please ask for me when you do. I wish you many blessings and Godspeed in all of your hopes and dreams together.
Sincerely,
John Poole
Vice President
